name: EXPOSURE_ABSTNS
description: This table contains information about outbreak and exposure abstractions.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: EXPOSURE_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case note associated with the exposure abstraction.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient who was exposed.

columns.name: PATIENT_DIED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient died.

columns.name: DEATH_DATE
columns.description: The date of the patient's death.

columns.name: MDR_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The MDR type category ID that the patient was exposed to.

columns.name: EXPOSURE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The status category ID for the exposure case.

columns.name: DX_DATE
columns.description: The date that the exposed patient was diagnosed as positive with an infection.

columns.name: PASSIVATING_DATE
columns.description: The date by which the patient's exposure case should be resolved.

columns.name: MICROBE_ORGANISM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the organism for the patient's exposure case.

columns.name: MICROBE_ORGANISM_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the organism.

columns.name: SPA_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The SPA type category ID specifying the strain of MRSA for the patient's exposure.

columns.name: RISK_PERMANENCE_C_NAME
columns.description: The degree of permanence category ID for the patient's exposure to the organism.

columns.name: RISK_CERTAINTY_C_NAME
columns.description: The degree of certainty category ID that the patient was exposed to the microbe.

columns.name: RESOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: The source of information category ID for the exposure investigation.

columns.name: RISK_EDIT_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The edit reason category ID for modifying the exposure case.

columns.name: RISK_END_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The end reason category ID for closing the exposure case.

columns.name: RISK_REACTIVATE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The reactivation reason category ID for reopening a closed exposure case.

columns.name: OUTBREAK_REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the outbreak investigation that the exposure case is a part of.

columns.name: SAMPLE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The sample type category ID which diagnosed the patient.

columns.name: DX_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description: The region category ID where the patient was diagnosed with the infection.

columns.name: DX_FACILITY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of facility category ID where the patient was diagnosed with the infection.

columns.name: DX_FACILITY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the facility where the patient was diagnosed with the infection.

columns.name: DX_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the ward where the patient was diagnosed with the infection.

columns.name: EPIDEMIC_CODE
columns.description: The description of the outbreak event.

columns.name: CREATION_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who created the abstraction

columns.name: CREATION_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EXPOSER_PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient who exposed other patients to the outbreak.

columns.name: EXPOSURE_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: The exposure source category ID for whether the exposure occurred domestically or abroad.

columns.name: HOSPITAL_CONTACT_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of contact category ID for the visit where the patient was exposed.

columns.name: TRANSMISSION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The transmission type category ID for whether the transmission was hospital-acquired or community-acquired.

columns.name: COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: The country category ID where the exposure occurred, if abroad.

columns.name: TRANSMISSION_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description: The region category ID where the patient was exposed to the microbe.

columns.name: TRANSMISSION_FAC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of facility category ID where the patient was exposed to the microbe.

columns.name: TRANSMISSION_FACILITY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the facility where the patient was exposed to the microbe.

columns.name: TRANSMISSION_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the ward where the patient was exposed to the microbe.

columns.name: REGISTRY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The registry type category ID for the exposure or outbreak abstraction.
entries: Physician Quality Reporting Registry Summary - Full Year
Physician Quality Reporting Registry Summary - Half Year
Physician Quality Reporting EHR Summary - Full Year
UNOS Pancreas and Pancreas Islets Candidate Registration
Australian and New Zealand Pediatric Intensive Care Registry
Australian and New Zealand Neonatal Network
American Heart Association Get With The Guidelines - Stroke
IRF Risk Adjustment ICD-10 to HCC Mappings
Scoring System Deferral User Interface Configuration

columns.name: CUR_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The current status category ID of the abstraction.

columns.name: CUR_STAT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who set the current abstraction status.

columns.name: CUR_STAT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: CUR_STAT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the current abstraction status was set.

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DATE
columns.description: The date the record was created.

columns.name: HOW_CREATED_C_NAME
columns.description: The creation method category ID for the exposure abstraction.
entries: Case Reporting - Automated - Reason for Visit

columns.name: EXPOSURE_REMARKS
columns.description: Information about how this exposure should impact patient care.

columns.name: DECLARED_DATE
columns.description: The date the outbreak was declared.

columns.name: DECLARED_OVER_DATE
columns.description: The date the outbreak was declared over.

columns.name: EXPOSED_DATE
columns.description: Date the patient was exposed.
